heroTitle1: Reuniting you with your lost treasures.
heroSubtitle: FindItNow is the easiest way to report lost and found items. Whether you've lost a personal item or found something that belongs to someone else, we're here to help.
feature1Desc: Browse our public database of lost and found items.
feature2Desc: Quickly create a report for a lost or found item.
feature3Desc: Manage found items for your organization.
benefit1: Centralized platform for lost & found items.
benefit2: AI-powered matching to connect owners and finders.
benefit3: Secure messaging to protect your privacy.
successQuote: I lost my camera at the park and thought it was gone forever. Thanks to FindItNow, someone found it and I got it back the next day!
downloadSubtitle: Manage your items on the go.
faqLink1: What should I do if I lose an item?
faqLink2: How do I claim a found item?
faqLink4: How does the AI matching work?
testimonialsSubtitle: Stories from people we've helped reunite.
footerReuniting: Reuniting people with their valued possessions.

reportFormFoundDesc: Thank you for being a good samaritan! Please describe the item you found.

toastClaimSubmittedDesc: Your claim has been sent to the item's reporter. They will review it and get in touch if it's a match.

aboutSubtitle: We believe in the power of community to bring lost items back to their rightful owners.
aboutMissionDesc: Our mission is to create the most effective and user-friendly platform for reporting and recovering lost and found items. We aim to reduce the stress and hassle of losing something valuable by leveraging technology and fostering a community of helpful individuals and partner organizations.
aboutValues1Desc: We foster a supportive network where people help each other.
aboutValues2Desc: We operate with transparency and prioritize the security of our users.
aboutValues3Desc: We continuously improve our technology to make finding items easier.
aboutJoinDesc: Become a part of our growing network and help make a difference.
contactSubtitle: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.
contactFormDesc: Fill out the form and our team will get back to you within 24 hours.
contactToastSuccessDesc: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you soon.
contactToastErrorDesc: There was a problem sending your message. Please try again.
contactInfoDesc: For direct inquiries, you can reach us via:
contactFollowDesc: Stay up to date with our latest news.
faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our platform and services.
faq1Title: What should I do if I lose an item?
faq1Content: If you lose an item, the first step is to report it on our platform. Go to the 'Report Lost Item' page and provide as many details as you can, including a description, the location where you last saw it, and photos. Our system will then work to match your item with found reports.
faq2Title: How do I claim an item that I think is mine?
faq2Content: When you find a listing for an item you believe is yours, click on the 'Claim Ownership' button. You will be asked to provide specific details about the item that only the owner would know. This is to ensure the item is returned to its rightful owner. The person who found the item will review your claim.
faq3Title: Is my personal information kept private?
faq3Content: Absolutely. We take your privacy very seriously. Your contact information is only shared between a finder and a claimant after a claim has been verified and accepted. All communication can happen through our secure, anonymous messaging system.
faq4Title: How does the AI-powered matching work?
faq4Content: Our smart matching system uses artificial intelligence to analyze the details of lost and found reports. It compares keywords in descriptions, locations, and other data points to suggest potential matches, increasing the chances of a successful reunion.
faq5Title: What is the role of business partners?
faq5Content: We partner with businesses and venues like airports, malls, and hotels to manage their lost and found inventory. This creates a wider, more connected network, making it more likely that your item will be found and returned, even if you lost it at a large public place.
faq6Title: Is there a fee for using FindItNow?
faq6Content: Using FindItNow is completely free for individuals reporting and claiming items. We are committed to helping people and believe that this service should be accessible to everyone.
hiwSubtitle: Reuniting with your lost items is just a few steps away.
hiwStep1Desc: Search our database for your lost item, or report a found item to help someone else.
hiwStep2Desc: Give a detailed description and upload photos to help us make a perfect match.
hiwStep3Desc: Our AI system works to find matches. You'll be notified when a potential match is found.
hiwStep4Desc: Use our secure chat to connect with the finder or owner and arrange the reunion.
privacyIntroContent: Welcome to FindItNow. We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service.
privacyInfoCollectContent1: We may collect personal information that you provide to us directly, such as your name, email address, and phone number when you create an account, report an item, or make a claim.
privacyInfoCollectContent2: We also collect information about the items you report, including descriptions, locations, and images. All user data is handled with the utmost care and is essential for the functionality of our service.
privacyInfoUseContent: We use the information we collect to operate and maintain our service, facilitate matches between lost and found items, communicate with you, and improve our platform. We will never sell your personal information to third parties.
privacyInfoShareContent: Your contact information is only shared between a claimant and a reporter after a claim has been mutually accepted, to facilitate the return of an item. We may share anonymized data for statistical analysis to improve our service.
privacyInfoKeepContent: We retain your personal data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your information to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our policies.
privacyInfoSafeContent: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable.
privacyMinorsContent: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we will take steps to delete such information.
privacyRightsContent: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights under applicable data protection laws. These may include the right to access, correct, update, or request deletion of your personal information. You can manage your account information from your user dashboard.
termsAgreementContent: By using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time.
termsServiceDescContent: FindItNow provides a platform to help users report and find lost and found items. We act as a facilitator to connect individuals but are not involved in the direct exchange or return of items. We do not guarantee the return of any item.
termsUserConductContent: You agree to provide accurate and truthful information when using our service. You are responsible for any content you post and for your interactions with other users. You agree not to use the service for any unlawful purpose or to engage in any fraudulent activity.
termsDisclaimersContent: The service is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis. FindItNow makes no warranties, expressed or implied, regarding the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of the content on our platform. We do not verify the identity of our users or the authenticity of the items reported.
termsLiabilityContent: In no event shall FindItNow, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of property, profits, data, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of or inability to access or use the service.
termsGoverningLawContent: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which our company is established, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

servicesBusinessFeat4: Analytics and reporting on item turnover.
